name: Claw Hammer
description: Forged steel claw hammer with fiberglass handle for durability and reduced vibration.

name: Cordless Drill Driver
description: 18-volt cordless drill/driver kit with 2 batteries, charger, and carrying case.

name: Assorted Wood Screws
description: 200-piece assortment of #8 x 1" to 2.5" zinc-plated wood screws.

name: Interior Latex Paint
description: One-gallon can of premium interior paint, eggshell finish. Available in various colors.

name: Adjustable Wrench
description: Chrome-plated adjustable wrench with smooth jaw adjustment and comfortable grip.

name: LED Shop Light
description: Energy-efficient 4-foot LED shop light, 5000K daylight, plug-in or hardwire.

name: Gas Grill
description: 3-burner propane gas grill with side shelves, 500 sq. inch cooking surface.

name: Deadbolt Lock
description: Grade 2 single cylinder deadbolt with 2.5" backset, includes keys.

name: Fire Extinguisher
description: 5-lb ABC dry chemical fire extinguisher for home and workshop use.

name: Tape Measure
description: 25-foot tape measure with durable blade, magnetic tip, and easy-read markings.
